value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Hmm, what should I call this next
venture? How about...Sharp Weapon
Operators Reporting for Duty? Nah...$k$p$WmMPID_レイラ,ch03_27_Laila_F_Normal,Face|...$k$pA whole week of this already. This
investigation's going nowhere.$k$p$WmMPID_ニルス,ch03_28_Nils_M_Normal,Face|Hi there, Leila! What are you up to,
creeping around over here? Oh! Is it
a game of hide-and-seek?$k$p$WmMPID_レイラ,ch03_27_Laila_F_Normal,Face|Shh! Keep your voice down!$k$pThis is not a game. It's an
intelligence-gathering operation.
Shoo!$k$p$WmMPID_ニルス,ch03_28_Nils_M_Normal,Face|Um, what?$k$p$WmMPID_フィオーラ,ch03_24_Fiora_F_Normal,Face|I hope you have some good news.
My efforts have yielded nothing.$k$p$WmMPID_ラス,ch03_26_Ruth_M_Normal,Face|Same. The most obvious leads have
all gone cold, though that's probably
not a surprise.$k$pI have managed to meet up with
some of Elibe's most well-known
figures, at least.$k$p$WmMPID_レイラ,ch03_27_Laila_F_Normal,Face|It's as Lord Hector suspected.
There's nothing to report.$k$pStill, I can't shake the feeling that
something isn't right. That we're
missing something.$k$p$WmMPID_ニルス,ch03_28_Nils_M_Normal,Face|So, um... Care to explain why you're
spying on Commander Anna?$k$p$WmMPID_レイラ,ch03_27_Laila_F_Normal,Face|Ugh... Fine—but listen closely, and
keep this strictly between us.$k$pWe think there's more to Commander
Anna than meets the eye. We've been
tasked with finding out the truth.$k$p$WmMPID_ニルス,ch03_28_Nils_M_Normal,Face|The truth about Commander Anna?
What does that even mean? And why
does it sound so ominous?$k$p
